channel.title: React on Je pense donc je suis

item.title: A Little Taste on React
item.author: elricfeng@gmail.com (Wenfeng Gao)
item.description: I have some experience on Android development, and recently for some reason I want to try React Native. As the RN official tutorial said: So to understand the basic structure of a React Native app, you need to understand some of the basic React concepts, like JSX, components, state, and props. “Maybe I should listen to this guy’s suggestion”, I said to myself, so I spent a week to understand what is React and how to use it.
